message.entry: Input image must be of size MxN or MxNx3.
Input image of type int16 must be of size MxN.
When {0} is true, input image must be single or double.
Number of superpixels must be less than or equal to the number of pixels in the input image.
In code generation, the size of the input image along the third dimension must be fixed (i.e. a compile-time constant).
